name: Toxapex
description: The Brutal Star Pokémon. To attack, this Pokémon sends toxic spikes flying at its enemies. Ones that come close get mown down by the claws on its feet.

abilities.name: Merciless
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles their damage dice when dealing damage to an opponent that is poisoned.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to being paralyzed.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.
